2182.subject: SPED
2182.course_title_long: Meth Cul/Ling Div Students with  Learning Challenges
2182.descrlong: Emphasizes a practical approach to the teaching and learning of listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills in a second language of students with and without special education needs from culturally and linguistically diverse backgrounds. The course goal is to enable special educators to make effective decisions when teaching English Language Learners.  Course delivery options to include online, hybrid and face to face.  (Offered fall, summer, and when interest warrants).
